product_name: REI Midweight Print Union Suit - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Midweight Print union suit cuddles little girls in a warm first layer for outdoor fun in cold weather. Soft peached polyester fabric with a touch of spandex stretches for fit; it draws moisture away from skin for all-day comfort. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Long front zipper runs diagonally for easy diaper changes; chin guard at the top protects against zipper abrasion. Cuffed sleeves and legs; gusseted crotch; flat seams; mock turtleneck.
short_description: The REI Midweight Print union suit cuddles little girls in a warm first layer for outdoor fun in cold weather.
